overview: DEBORAH LIU is manager of product marketing for Facebook Credits and Games at Facebook, where she oversees initiatives related to game applications on Facebook.com and the Facebook virtual currency. Prior to Facebook, Deborah spent seven years at eBay and PayPal, where she had various roles including Director of Product Marketing Management for the eBay business at PayPal and Director of Product Management for the eBay Buyer Experience. Deborah has an MBA from Stanford Graduate School of Business and a bachelor’s degree in civil and environmental engineering from Duke University.

relationships.title: Manager of Product Marketing, Facebook Credits
